assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Risdiplam_Renewal_Initiation_Criteria_Q3_R1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: In patients who were aged between 2 years and 25 years at the time of treatment initiation, there is demonstrated maintenance of motor function (as assessed using an age-appropriate measurement) after treatment initiation.
